text:
Al-Azhar va O‚Äòzbekiston o‚Äòrtasida yangi ilmiy loyihalar boshlanadi

Misrning diniy-ijtimoiy yo‚Äònalishdagi mashhur nashri ‚Äî Al-Liwaa Al-Islami‚Äôda Saida Mirziyoyeva mamlakat bosh imomi bilan qo‚Äòshma ta‚Äôlim va ilm-fan sohasidagi loyihalarni muhokama qilgani haqida maqola e‚Äôlon qilindi.

Batafsil ‚Äî https://daryo.uz/779G37MvR

üëâ Obuna bo‚Äòling ‚Äî @daryo

translations.uz:
Al-Azhar va O‚Äòzbekiston o‚Äòrtasida yangi ilmiy loyihalar boshlanadi

Misrning diniy-ijtimoiy yo‚Äònalishdagi mashhur nashri ‚Äî Al-Liwaa Al-Islami‚Äôda Saida Mirziyoyeva mamlakat bosh imomi bilan qo‚Äòshma ta‚Äôlim va ilm-fan sohasidagi loyihalarni muhokama qilgani haqida maqola e‚Äôlon qilindi.

translations.en:
New scientific projects are starting between Al-Azhar and Uzbekistan

An article was published in Al-Liwaa Al-Islami, a popular religious and social publication of Egypt, about the discussion of joint projects in the field of education and science by Saida Mirziyoyeva with the chief imam of the country.

More details - https://daryo.uz/779G37MvR

üëâ Subscribe ‚Äî @daryo
